title: Dealmaster: Trackers, Garmin watches, Tempurpedic chairs, and more
content:
Whether you're traveling and need to track your luggage or you're getting back into the fitness game with a fitness tracker to take advantage of the cooler fall weather, we have deals on AirTags, Garmin watches, and connected health equipment. Even if you're not traveling or working out, our latest Dealmaster edition also comes packed with savings on ergonomic chairs from Steelcase and Tempurpedic, laptops from Apple and Lenovo, and office tech and organization gear to keep your workspace tidy.

AirTag and Pebblebee trackers and accessories

AirTags also come in packs of four for $99. (credit: Samuel Axon)

  • Pebblebee Clip 4-pack for $80 after PB2SCHOOL code (was $120) at Pebblebee
  • Pebblebee Card & Clip Multi-pack for $100 (was $120) at Pebblebee
  • Apple AirTag 4 Pack for $89 (was $99) at Amazon
